episodes.synopsis: Chefs Sarah Grueneberg and Alberico Nunziata are coached by Jeff Mauro and Alex Guarnaschelli as they do battle before a culinary showdown with Bobby.
episodes.title: Grueneberg and Nunziata

episodes.synopsis: Grits are on the menu for Anthony Lamas and Jennifer Nguyen as Bobby's mentor Jonathan Waxman and Sunny Anderson help the chefs take on Bobby.
episodes.title: Welcome to New York!

episodes.synopsis: It's a chicken and waffle jamboree as Georgia "chefarmer" Matthew Raiford and Bostonian Karen Akunowicz strategize with Michael Symon to beat Bobby.
episodes.title: Farmer and the Belle

episodes.synopsis: Fusion cuisine is on the menu when Brian Tsao and Adam Harvey take strategy tips from Anne Burrell and Alex Guarnaschelli in the Bobby battle.
episodes.title: Old Dog, New Tricks

episodes.synopsis: Chef Giada de Laurentiis and "Iron Chef" judge Mo Rocca counsel cancer survivor Steven McHugh and ex-rocker Brian Young on a bangers and mash mash-up.
episodes.title: Fighting Irish

episodes.synopsis: The different styles of country girl Rochelle Bilow and city boy Paul Denamiel are put to the test to see who will get a chance to beat Bobby.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Feast

episodes.synopsis: Caterer extraordinaire Kimberly Van Kline and award-winning chef Christopher Lee are coached by Bobby's friends Alex Guarnaschelli and Jack McDavid.
episodes.title: Eat, Flay, Love

episodes.synopsis: Bobby's pal Michael Symon and comedian Ali Wentworth help chefs Kamal Rose and Shannon Bard tackle crab cakes for a chance to put Bobby away.
episodes.title: Up in Smoke

episodes.synopsis: Seasoned chef Andrew Evans is hoping to school young upstart Brooke Mallory in a meatloaf battle, with some assist by "The Kitchen" star Katie Lee.
episodes.title: Old School/New School

video.title: Beat Bobby Flay
video.synopsis: Two chefs create mouthwatering masterpieces, and the winner will prepare his or her own signature dish in a showdown with celebrity chef Bobby Flay.
